name: should_be_able_to_quickly_complete_all_todos

testSteps.description: Starts with a todo list containing: {Walk the dog,Put out the garbage}

children.description: Adds todo items called: {Walk the dog,Put out the garbage}
Adds a todo item called: Walk the dog
Adds a todo item called: Put out the garbage

testSteps.description: Should see that that following items are marked as complete: {Walk the dog,Put out the trash}

children.description: Should see that that following item is marked as complete: Walk the dog
